column5: I seen an ad on Youtube a while back advertising a clip on eye for your rod close to the grip.  In the video it showed some pretty serious movement added to your cranks and actually most other bait.  I laughed it off at first but the more I thought about it the more I think it makes complete sense.  Just wondering if anyone has any information on the name of the product and/or if it actually works.  I asked at my bait shop and tried to find information on-line with no success,
I forget the name of the product... But I know a guy that actually tried em... He swears that they work....
Line dancer...http://www.amazon.com/LINEDANCER-FISHING-TOOL-INCREASES-ACTION/dp/B00333E5UC  Have never used it, just remember getting a chuckle out of it.
And cuts your cast distance by half.
Amazon, I should have known.  Thank you for info. guys.  If I ever see one in person I might pick one up.  Thnx again,
